Project.Brief history of your project and organi: TopTalents focuses on providing precise recruitment of talents in K12 international education industry and consulting services on human resources and talent development of international schools, and builds HR learning community by regularly holding international school human resources summit, researching human resources related topics and releasing reports on international school human resources and salary system. Provide talent increment for the development of international schools, advocate the healthy flow of talents, and support the optimization of human resource management of schools.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: Educational resources video online courses for schools in various countries and regions

Our current data is stored on our server in the computer room
